label: 朝餉の間
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: The room in the Seiryoden where the emperor ate light morning and evening meals. It was directly west of the imperial bedchamber (Yoru no otodo). [清涼殿] [夜の御殿]
